Please record any data before upload to server
Press and hold the red button to record
Touch to upload your record to our server
Open the menu to see other options
This will remove all recordings stored in your device
This record is not longer in device
We would like to know your name
This is Open Speech Corpus V2 check out the changes

We're improved network consumption saving all the sentences in your local phone
 But don't worry, we just download tales that you requested

 We also want to involve more in our acoustic model creation for spanish, starting with a little grammar for a simple Intelligent Personal Assistant, so don't get bored reading numbers and simple commands, is a really good cause. We really thank you your collaboration 

 In the next few days we'll upload new tales, if you want your favorite tale in OPS tell us We're glad to add it to our database. Even if you want to donate your own writings, let us know and we will add it to our database. 

 Thanks again for all your support.

 Ma0 at contraslash.com
